languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт вздрагивает от ваших слов и неуверенно косится на эльдаров.{/n} "Элантах... прав, Шайрэнкхей. Разве Путь Воина учит жертвовать бесчисленным множеством жизней ради достижения цели? Дети Азуриана — не палачи миров, не убийцы невинных".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ирлиэт вздрагивает от ваших слов и неуверенно косится на эльдаров.{/n} "Элантах... прав, собрат Саренрай. Разве Путь Война учит жертвовать бесчисленным множеством жизней ради достижения цели? Дети Азуриана — не палачи миров, не убийцы невинных".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Your words startle Yrliet, who looks at the assembled Aeldari with uncertainty.{/n} "The elantach... is right, Shairenkhei. Does the Path of the Warrior teach you to sacrifice countless lives to achieve your goals? The Children of Asuryan are not the executioners of worlds, nor slayers of the innocent."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт вздрагивает от ваших слов и неуверенно косится на эльдаров.{/n} "Элантах... прав, Шайрэнкхей. Разве Путь Воина учит жертвовать бесчисленным множеством жизней ради достижения цели? Дети Азуриана — не палачи миров, не убийцы невинных".

traits.locale_text: {n}Your words startle Yrliet who looks at the Aeldari with uncertainly.{/n} "Elantach... is right, Shairenkhei. Does the Path of the Warrior teach to sacrifice countless lives to achieve your goals? The Children of Asuryan do not reave the defenceless worlds, nor do they slay the innocent."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

Does the Path of the Warrior teach you to sacrifice countless lives to achieve your goals? The Children of Asuryan are not the executioners of worlds, nor slayers of the innocent."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tus palabras sorprenden a Yrliet, que mira a los Aeldari reunidos con expresión indecisa.{/n} «{mf|El|La} elantach... tiene razón, Shairenkhei. ¿Acaso la Senda del Guerrero te enseña que has de sacrificar innumerables vidas para alcanzar tus objetivos? Los hijos de Asuryan no son verdugos de mundos ni asesinos de inocentes».
languages.original_text: {n}Your words startle Yrliet, who looks at the assembled Aeldari with uncertainty.{/n} "The elantach... is right, Shairenkhei. Does the Path of the Warrior teach you to sacrifice countless lives to achieve your goals? The Children of Asuryan are not the executioners of worlds, nor slayers of the innocent."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tus palabras sorprenden a Yrliet, que mira al Aeldari con expresión indecisa.{/n} «{mf|El|La} elantach... tiene razón, Shairenkhei. ¿Acaso la Senda del Guerrero te enseña que has de sacrificar innumerables vidas para alcanzar tus objetivos? Los hijos de Asuryan no son verdugos de mundos ni asesinos de inocentes».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}你的话让伊莉耶特吃了一惊，她不确定地望向那位全副武装的艾达灵族。{/n}“外界人……说得对，榭伦赫。难道你踏上战士道途，就是为了牺牲无数生命来实现你的目标吗？阿苏焉之子不是毁灭世界的刽子手，更不是屠戮无辜之人的凶手。”
languages.original_text: {n}Your words startle Yrliet, who looks at the assembled Aeldari with uncertainty.{/n} "The elantach... is right, Shairenkhei. Does the Path of the Warrior teach you to sacrifice countless lives to achieve your goals? The Children of Asuryan are not the executioners of worlds, nor slayers of the innocent."

traits.locale_text: {n}你的话让伊莉耶特吃了一惊，她不确定地望向那位艾达灵族。{/n}“外界人……说得对，榭伦赫。难道你踏上战士道途，就是为了牺牲无数生命来实现你的目标吗？阿苏焉之子不是毁灭世界的刽子手，更不是屠戮无辜之人的凶手。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Vos paroles surprennent Yrliet, qui lance un regard incertain aux guerriers aeldaris.{/n} « L'elantach... a raison, Shairenkhei. La Voie du Guerrier vous apprend-elle à sacrifier d'innombrables vies pour atteindre vos objectifs ? Les enfants d'Asuryan ne sont pas des bourreaux de mondes ni des tueurs d'innocents. »
languages.original_text: {n}Your words startle Yrliet, who looks at the assembled Aeldari with uncertainty.{/n} "The elantach... is right, Shairenkhei. Does the Path of the Warrior teach you to sacrifice countless lives to achieve your goals? The Children of Asuryan are not the executioners of worlds, nor slayers of the innocent."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vos paroles surprennent Yrliet, qui lance un regard incertain au guerrier aeldari.{/n} « L'elantach... a raison, Shairenkhei. La Voie du Guerrier vous apprend-elle à sacrifier d'innombrables vies pour atteindre vos objectifs ? Les enfants d'Asuryan ne sont pas des bourreaux de mondes ni des tueurs d'innocents. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}あなたの言葉に驚いたユリエットは、不安げに集まったアエルダリを見つめる。{/n}「エランタの…言う通りだ、シャイレンケイ。戦士の道は、目的を達成するために無数の命を犠牲にすることを教えるのか？アシュリアンの御子らは、世界を処刑する者でも、罪のない者を殺す者でもないはずだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Your words startle Yrliet, who looks at the assembled Aeldari with uncertainty.{/n} "The elantach... is right, Shairenkhei. Does the Path of the Warrior teach you to sacrifice countless lives to achieve your goals? The Children of Asuryan are not the executioners of worlds, nor slayers of the innocent."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの言葉に驚いたユリエットは、不安げに集まったアエルダリを見つめる。{/n}「エランタの…言う通りだ、シャイレンケイ。戦士の道は、目的を達成するために無数の命を犠牲にすることを教えるのか？アシュリアンの御子らは、世界を処刑する者でも、罪のない者を殺す者でもないはずだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Deine Worte überraschen Yrliet, die die versammelten Aeldari unsicher ansieht.{/n} "Der Elantach ... hat recht, Shairenkhei. Lehrt der Pfad des Kriegers Euch, unzählige Leben zu opfern, um Eure Ziele zu erreichen? Die Kinder von Asuryan sind keine Henker von Welten und keine Schlächter von Unschuldigen."
languages.original_text: {n}Your words startle Yrliet, who looks at the assembled Aeldari with uncertainty.{/n} "The elantach... is right, Shairenkhei. Does the Path of the Warrior teach you to sacrifice countless lives to achieve your goals? The Children of Asuryan are not the executioners of worlds, nor slayers of the innocent."

traits.locale_text: {n}Deine Worte überraschen Yrliet, die den Aeldari unsicher ansieht.{/n} "Elantach ... hat recht, Shairenkhei. Lehrt der Pfad des Kriegers Euch, unzählige Leben zu opfern, um Eure Ziele zu erreichen? Die Kinder von Asuryan sind keine Henker von Welten und keine Schlächter von Unschuldigen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sözlerin, toplanan Aeldarilere tereddütle bakan Yrliet'i ürkütüyor.{/n} "Shairenkhei, elantach... Haklı. Savaşçının Yolu, sana amaçlarına ulaşmak için sayısız canı feda etmeyi mi öğretiyor? Asuryan'ın Çocukları, ne dünyaların celladıdır ne de masumların katili."
languages.original_text: {n}Your words startle Yrliet, who looks at the assembled Aeldari with uncertainty.{/n} "The elantach... is right, Shairenkhei. Does the Path of the Warrior teach you to sacrifice countless lives to achieve your goals? The Children of Asuryan are not the executioners of worlds, nor slayers of the innocent."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sözlerin, toplanan Aeldarilere tereddütle bakan Yrliet'i ürkütüyor.{/n} "Shairenkhei, elantach... Haklı. Savaşçının Yolu, sana amaçlarına ulaşmak için sayısız canı feda etmeyi mi öğretir? Asuryan'ın Çocukları, dünyaların cellatları da değildir masumların katili de."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
